content: I'm glad I got the moisturizer recommendation right for my dry skin. Now, I'm wondering if you have any tips on how to establish a consistent morning routine, since I've been struggling with that lately. I've been trying to wake up at 7:00 am every weekday, but I often find myself hitting the snooze button and sleeping in later than I should. Do you have any advice on how to make mornings easier and more productive?
